About the Company: Satin Creditcare Network Limited operates as a non-banking finance company providing microfinance loans on joint liability and individual liability basis in India. The company provides loans to urban and rural poor to meet their productive requirements in starting new businesses or growing existing businesses. It serves clients throughout Bihar, Chandigarh, Delhi, Haryana, Jammu, Madhya Pradesh, Punjab, Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh, and Uttarakhand states. The company was formerly known as Satin Leasing & Finance Private Limited and changed its name to Satin Creditcare Network Limited in April 2000. Satin Creditcare Network Limited was founded in 1990 and is based in Azadpur, India.
